import React, {useState} from 'react' export default function Loginform({Login,error}) { const[details, setDetails] = useState({email:"" ,password:""}); const sumbitHandler = e => { e.preventDefault(); Login(details); } return (

Registration form

setDetails({...details, name: e.target.value})} value={details.name}/>
setDetails({...details, password: e.target.value})} value={details.password}/>
) }
